contribution_desc: Optical method for bi-directional data transfer between tabletops and phones (this essentially works for any pair of devices where one has a camera and the other has a display)
tracking_tech: Optical (but not really device tracking; it's used for data transfer)
device_models: Google Nexus One; OFFIS Interactive Table
use_cases_desc: Bi-directional data transfer between mobile device and tabletop
contribution: Toolkit, middleware; Optical data transfer technology
evaluation: Technical evaluation (e.g., runtime, roundtrip); Speed and error rate of data transfer
